Title: Your guide to events this weekend and beyond
Summary: The second weekend of 2026 is already taking shape . How you spend these early days can quietly set the tone for what follows . This guide pulls together where to go, what to see, and how .

Title: Femi Adebayo: full circle, with fire
Summary: Femi Adebayo returns to the audience that shaped him, to the kind of storytelling that built him up . He says this is a return to his storytelling roots, and to the storytelling that made him famous . The Nigerian born born in Nairobi, Nigeria, has been in Nigeria since 2007 .

Title: Why Wamakko’s support of Tinubu matters
Summary: Senator Aliyu Magatakarda Wamakko’s public endorsement of President Bola Ahmed Tinubu during the Sokoto State chapter of the All Progressives Congress .

Title: Moghalu: A fragmented opposition cannot defeat APC in 2027
Summary: As Nigeria heads towards the 2027 general elections, the political landscape is already shifting . Over the past few months, defections from the APC have been made .

Title: Age Falsification: panic in AFN as AIU January 16 deadline approaches
Summary: The board of Athletics Federation of Nigeria (AFN) is running from pillar to post, looking for solutions on the age falsification saga .

Title: CBN forecasts petrol price at N950 per litre in 2026
Summary: The Dangote Petroleum Refinery currently puts its gantry price at N699 per litre . CBN said the price of Premium Motor Spirit, PMS, also known as petrol could rise to about N950 per lorry in 2026 .

Title: Fayose accuses Atiku, Tambuwal of wrecking PDP
Summary: Fayose said he stood by his decision to support President Bola Tinubu of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in the 2023 election . Fayose accused Atiku, Tambuwal of wrecking PDP .

Title: My leaked intimate video had serious mental toll on me – Moyo Lawal
Summary: Popular actress Moyo Lawal has spoken about her emotional healing journey after a leaked intimate video went viral in 2023 . The leaked video had serious mental toll on her, affecting her deeply .

Title: Fears that genuine elections won’t hold in 2027 fuelling defections to APC —Jacob Mark
Summary: Fears that genuine elections won't hold in 2027 fuelling defections to APC —Jacob Mark . Mark suggests reasons politicians are defecting to the ruling All Progressives Congress, APC, among others .

Title: AFRIMA 2026: Burna Boy, Davido, DJ Maphorisa battle for supremacy
Summary: Lagos is buzzing with excitement as Africa's biggest music awards show, AFRIMA, rounds off tomorrow . Burna Boy, Davido, DJ Maphorisa battle for supremacy .
